description: Variation of condition 2 to ref: 19/04401/FUL to allow the changes to the approved design, through the introduction of additional private amenity space for unit 5.
decision_conditions: The proposed projecting rear balcony, by virtue of its proximity to the neighbouring first floor bedroom window of 14 Albany Road, would give rise to an unacceptable level of noise disturbance, therefore failing to preserve the residential amenity of the neighbouring occupants.  As such, the proposal is considered to be contrary to Policies D3 Optimising Site Capacity Through the Design-Led Approach of the London Plan 2021, Core Policy 32 Pollution of the Core Strategy 2010, DMD 8 General Standards for New Residential Development and DMD 68 Noise of the Development Management Document 2014 and the NPPF 2024.
